snippet.title: A Quick Journey to the Edge and back (2020) Game Trailer
snippet.description:
FOLLOW THE GAME HERE:
https://linktr.ee/DoctorLock
###################################
Thank you so much for checking out my game's trailer. This game has been my passion project throughout the many months of quarantine my state has been in. It would mean the world if you could share it with a friend or on your socials.
I'm so proud of what I've made and I can't wait to let you play it. Hopefully you're safe in these scary times,
-Lachlan 
###################################


Game Description:

A Quick Journey to the Edge is a completely free, adventure to rescue your father from the depths of afterlife known as "The Edge". The game has multiple endings, a compelling mystery and multiple bossfights. 
###################################
Credits:
https://freesound.org/people/metrostock99/sounds/514686/
https://freesound.org/people/alanmcki/sounds/401324/
